title: Make more actions available on text selection
description: I could not find the action 'Add Javadoc Comment' until I switched to the Outline view. Currently, some actions are available in the context menu while others are not. This distribution of actions should be changed to make it clear to users why certain actions are in the context menu and others are not. It is not acceptable to force users to switch views to access certain actions. All actions should be reachable from the editor.
OB: The action 'Add Javadoc Comment' is not available in the context menu.
SR: 1. Open the editor. 2. Select a block of text. 3. Right-click to open the context menu and observe the available actions. 4. Ensure that the action 'Add Javadoc Comment' is present in the context menu when a text selection is made.
